Subject: Battle at the Alliance Base
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

::Zardus/Prowl/DevilDuer/Hiss/Scavanger/Reptilica::

Hiss dives under the bolts, one of them hitting him in the back. He growls, 
firing again at Arcangel.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer's eyes widen as he sees the missiles coming at him, the Alliance 
bot trying to jump away, but not in time. The first one hits him in the 
chest, smashing him through three trees and out of the other missiles' path. 
He falls from the tree to the ground, going into stasis lock.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus dives under a missile, looking at Kamodia. This was getting pointless. 
The Alliance commander looks behind him at Arcangel, Icedragon, and Shocker.

"Reptilica," he says into his comm, "You, BloodyStrike, and Scattershot get 
out here and help."

"I can do even better..." Reptilica's voice replies as Zardus fires at 
Kamodia.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the Alliance base, Reptilica turns to face Prowl, Prowl stopping in his 
tracks.

"Allright, Maximal, here's the deal. Some of your friends are attacking the 
Ark. You call them off and we continue. You don't and you're welcome to blow 
us all up."

Prowl nods. "Allright," he says, activating his comm as he loses his temper.

"Arcangel," he says into his comm, his voice containing anger, "Retreat NOW! 
I want to have a talk with you later on about following orders."

Reptilica nods, resuming his course toward the entrance of the base.
